features: Doorbell Transformer Power Adapter: Ousaly doorbell transformer power adapter, powers your doorbell directly, keep your doorbell charging, plugs into your standard 110 V/ 120 V outlet and converts to 18 volt 500mA AC current

Equipped with a power adapter, the intelligent video doorbell will no longer have poor performance due to low battery power. There is no need to worry about the risk of the visual doorbell closing at an inappropriate time and the hassle of charging the battery every two months.

【Use with confidence】 Our power adapter for doorbells keeps your device constantly powered , and continuously operate without interruption. The power adapter have overheat protection, over-current protection, overload protection, over-voltage protection.

The power adapter allows you to directly connect the visual doorbell and power outlet, rather than messy wiring. Using a 5m cable, it can be connected to the power socket of the remote doorbell.【Easy Installation】Just simply connect the two ring terminals to the screws at the back of the doorbell. The wire ring design makes it easier to insta

【Product Guaranteed 】: Quality Warranty, any queries or problem, please freely contact with us. We commit provide you with 100% satisfaction product and service.Regardless of the reason, if you are not completely satisfied, you can request a replacement or a full refund.
body.description: Specifications For Doorbells Input voltage: 120 V AC, 60 hz, Output voltage: 18 V AC, 500 mA, Dimensions: 3. 9 x 2. 6 x 2. 4 inch Keep adapter unplugged.Install wires from 18 volt adapter into the terminals for your doorbell unit (Simply attach the two rings to the doorbell and tighten the screws, regardless of positive or negative polarity)Plug adapter into outlet.Power up and verify your doorbell is receiving necessary power using the accompanying application. For Doorbells Universal design for all kind of video doorbell. It can continuously power the video doorbell. If there is a rechargeable battery in the video doorbell, connecting this power adapter can charge the rechargeable battery, but the charging speed is slow. It wild-types various intelligent video doorbells, as long as the required voltage and current of the doorbell are consistent with this adapter. Note: Before purchasing, Please confirm that the voltage and current required by the doorbell are consistent with this power supply. Please consult the Voltage requirements of your doorbell for specific recommendations. Please connect the doorbell before connecting the power supply, and be careful not to let the two cables connected together cause short circuit.)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Description Super Compatibility: Works with almost all mainstream doorbells You can use this 18v doorbell transformer as long as your old doorbell meets power specifications. After our rigorous testing, this 18v transformer compatible model includes but is not limited to the following products:Nest Hello doorbell, Zmodo smart greeting wifi doorbell, Security Doorbell, Arlo video doorbell and other doorbells that require 18v power The multi-function doorbell adapter saves you the trouble of frequent battery replacementSpecial design and high quality materials ensure that the adapter is kept in low temperature to charge safely Note: Before purchasing, Please confirm that the voltage and current required by the doorbell are consistent with this power supply. Please consult the Voltage requirements of your doorbell for specific recommendations. Please connect the doorbell before connecting the power supply, and be careful not to let the two cables connected together cause short circuit

PACKAGE INCLUDES: 1 X 16.4ft Cabel 18V 500mA Video Doorbell transfomer (White) 16.4FT / 5M Enough Long , No need to worry about the distance between the socket and the doorbell. Easy to install: Simply attach the two rings to the doorbell and tighten the screws, regardless of positive or negative polarity. The wire ring design makes it easier to install and helps ensure the adapter is firmly connected to the doorbell. The wires are sturdy and flexible enough not to be easily torn. No worries about power failure： Provide continuous power to your device so that the video doorbell can run continuously without interruption.

Specifications For Doorbells Input voltage: 120 V AC, 60 hz, Output voltage: 18 V AC, 500 mA, Dimensions: 3. 9 x 2. 6 x 2. 4 inch Keep adapter unplugged.Install wires from 18 volt adapter into the terminals for your doorbell unit (Simply attach the two rings to the doorbell and tighten the screws, regardless of positive or negative polarity)Plug adapter into outlet.Power up and verify your doorbell is receiving necessary power using the accompanying application. For Doorbells Universal design for all kind of video doorbell. It can continuously power the video doorbell. If there is a rechargeable battery in the video doorbell, connecting this power adapter can charge the rechargeable battery, but the charging speed is slow. It wild-types various intelligent video doorbells, as long as the required voltage and current of the doorbell are consistent with this adapter. Note: Before purchasing, Please confirm that the voltage and current required by the doorbell are consistent with this power supply. Please consult the Voltage requirements of your doorbell for specific recommendations. Please connect the doorbell before connecting the power supply, and be careful not to let the two cables connected together cause short circuit.) Compatible with： Wyze Doorbell Pro Blink Video Doorbell Arlo Video Doorbell Eufy Video Doorbell Simplesafe Video Doorbell Arlo Camera

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Allows you to not have to remove nest doorbell to charge.
reviews.reviewText: Does the job it's intended to. Easy installation with minimal skills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saves time recharging
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, works great. I've only used it for a couple of days no problems so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Performs as expected
reviews.reviewText: I am using this with my new doorbell camera. Once I discovered where my original doorbell transformer was located it was an easy setup to connect it, especially since there was an outlet already positioned near the existing transformer. This new transformer is performing as expected with my new doorbell camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Used this to test my Eufy doorbell camera.Power supply works perfect.NICE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable Power Solution for Video Doorbells
reviews.reviewText: This 18V 500MA transformer is compatible with various video doorbell brands, including Ring, Eufy, Nest, Wyze, and Arlo, providing a versatile solution for my home security needs. The included 26.5FT cable ensures flexibility in installation, accommodating various setups. The white color seamlessly blends with my home exterior, maintaining a neat and tidy appearance. The plug-and-play functionality makes installation a breeze, and I appreciate the reliability it brings to keeping my video doorbell powered at all times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than solar for the RIng 2.
reviews.reviewText: I recently bought this Transformer and it’s so nice to not have to go out and unmount the doorbell to charge it. Plus, with constant power, the doorbell can use more features.I have a Ring 2nd gen doorbell and this adapter works perfectly with it. I didn’t have to worry about wiring in a solar panel, which was a huge relief,. I use solar on my cameras, but couldn't figure out how to use solar with this one. The cable is long enough to reach the power source without any issues. (I fed it through a window)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works well with my Ring doorbell
reviews.reviewText: I had my doubts but this Ring doorbell power adapter works great! I don't have a hardwired doorbell so taking the Ring down 1x a week to charge was getting tiring. It was easy to hook up, just had to run the wire down under the front door into my living room and plug it in. Easy as could be and it's keeping my Ring battery at 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Dead in 3 months
reviews.reviewText: Do not buy it will go out in 3 months
